Tag_Youmay.description: the genetic memory | the [[Aias the Clean | mercenary]]

Tag_Imageneed.description: Assassin's Creed: Odyssey — [[Legacy of the First Blade]]

MemoryInfobox.description: 'Despite his brutish look, Aias the Clean|this mercenary favored strategy over force. He wisely opted to strategize with the 'polemarch' in Olouros Fortress instead of facing the Kassandra|Eagle Bearer without a plan.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey' – 'Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage'

General_Description: '''Aias the Clean''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Kassandra tracked down [[Aias the Clean]], one of the [[mercenaries]] sent by the [[Phila|Tempest]] to eliminate her.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found Aias the Clean in the [[Olouros Fortress]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''He's over there.''
Kassandra infiltrated fort and eliminated the mercenary.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and eliminated mercenary Aias the Clean.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]'' – ''[[Legacy of the First Blade: Shadow Heritage]]''
